## CBTF Info

<div style="font-size:75%">

- We will be using a Computer-Based Testing Facility (CBTF) for the rest of the exams in this course
- There is a *practice* exam the week after spring break
	- Everybody has to take it!
  - We are going to "grade" it to practice the auto-grading, but as long as you complete it, you will get full credit (counts as a homework)
- It is a 50 minute slot, taken in Gilmer 490A
- Login info will be provided right after spring break
- The current schedule is:
	- 3/17 - 4PM, 5:30PM
	- 3/18 - 4PM, 5:30PM, 7PM
	- 3/19 - 2:30PM, 4PM, 5:30PM, 7PM
- You will be given a link to a system to register for ONE of those sections
- Further quizzes in this course will follow a similar pattern
- More information about this will be posted in Piazza in the next few days
